snippet: Even with a smaller-than-expected increase in premiums, however, the share of small businesses offering health insurance to employees declined slightly.
abstract: Even with a smaller-than-expected increase in premiums, however, the share of small businesses offering health insurance to employees declined slightly.

headline.main: Small Businesses See Only a Small Increase in Health Premiums

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
